get.desc: Get all Workbook templates defined within a specified resource group.

200.desc: A list containing 0 or more workbook template definitions.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.desc: Updates a workbook template that has already been added.

params.name: WorkbookTemplateUpdateParameters
params.desc: Properties that need to be specified to patch a workbook template.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
